message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hopefully, we can work out a better deal for both of us later.
I propose a 50/50 split. Fair is fair, and it gives us both an equal chance to negotiate a better deal in future rounds.

I understand you want a fair split, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's compromise - 60/40.  We can keep negotiating and see if we can reach a better outcome for both of us.
I agree with a 60/40 split. This seems like a fair compromise considering inflation and the value of our offers decreases in subsequent rounds.
